attributes.action: CHANGE  THE NAME OF MENTLE HEALTH DEPARTMENT
attributes.additional_details:
my whole life I have had mental health been on medications but my experience along with others the word alone makes you feel like your crazy it prevents you from seeking help people that do not understand it will relate to you as crazy person this has massive impact on the mind as a child and adult by changing the name I believe the stigma attached to it will help many people around the world ALSO HELP THE DEPARTMENT 
its a big vision on the mind the word MENTLE
attributes.background:
I AM A 36 year old women who used to suffer with mental health conditions as a child growing up  the word mental had a massive INPACT ON THE MIND 

mental health is includes DEPRESSION  . ANXIETY  . ADHD . AUTISIM . EMOTIONAL PERSONALITY DISORDER . MANY MORE

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is not clear what department you would like to change the name off. If you are referring to the use of 'mental health' in the NHS then you could suggest an alternative name and start a petition calling for the NHS to use that alternative word.
